steps.title: When purchasing, check for quality.
steps.content: When purchasing, check for quality. [1] X Research source Ensure that none of the rounds are broken or cracked.

steps.title: Keep the rounds in their original packaging in a cool, dry place.
steps.content: Keep the rounds in their original packaging in a cool, dry place. Once opened, wrap carefully to create an airtight environment, using food-grade plastic wrap. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Use within the date specified on the packaging.
steps.content: Use within the date specified on the packaging.
